#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
    int T,i;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    for(i=0;i<T;i++)
    {
        int n,j;
        int max1=0,max2=0,max3=0;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int seq[n];
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&seq[j]);
        }
        int pos=0;
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            if(seq[j]>max1)
            {
                max1=seq[j];
                pos=j;
            }
        }
        seq[pos]=0;
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            if(seq[j]>max2)
            {
                max2=seq[j];
                pos=j;
            }
        }
        seq[pos]=0;
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            if(seq[j]>max3)
            {
                max3=seq[j];
                pos=j;
            }
        }
        seq[pos]=0;
        int sum = max1+max2+max3;
        printf("Case %d: %d\n",i+1,sum);
    }
	return 0;
}
